TITLE: Manage
INFO: The manage oversees all connected encoders. Il allows to manage groups of encoders, start and stop recording, to score points of interest in the video, as well as to schedule timed recordings.

DETAIL.RECURRENT_EXPLANATION: By checking this box you set a daily record

DEVICE.ADD_TO_GROUP_SUCCESS: The encoder has been added to the group: {{name}}
DEVICE.ADD_TO_GROUP_ERROR: An error occurred while adding the encoder to the group: {{name}}
DEVICE.ADD_ACCEPTED_ERROR: An error occurred while updating the encoder to the state accepted
DEVICE.ADD_REFUSED_ERROR: An error occurred while updating the encoder to the state refused
DEVICE.REMOVE_ERROR: An error occurred. Removal of the encoder could not be performed
DEVICE.UPDATE_NAME_ERROR: An error occurred while updating the name
DEVICE.REMOVE_GROUP_ERROR: An error occurred. Removal of the group could not be performed

SCHEDULE.CONFLICT_ERROR: A scheduled job is already planned on this time slot
SCHEDULE.SAVE_ERROR: An error occurred while adding the scheduled job
SCHEDULE.REMOVE_ERROR: An error occurred. Removal of the scheduled job could not be performed
SCHEDULE.RECORD_IN_PROGRESS: Unable to remove the scheduled job because the recording is in progress

HISTORY.REMOVE_ERROR: An error occurred while removing the element from the history
